author: Rafal Nawrot
description: “The True BACARDÍ Desire is a mix of Polish hard work and Caribbean flow - I've tried to reflect two very different, supposedly opposite cultures. It's a cocktail to represent the sentiment of Bob Marley when he sings 'Don't Worry, About a Thing' - carrying the spirit of BACARDÍ to Poland.”
name: True Desire

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
